item.description:
Let's do something out of the ordinary.

October 15th will be the Museum's 5th Anniversary celebration and Grand Reopening. As of today there's no word on whether admission (normally $5.00, free if you're 60+) will be charged, but I encourage a donation in either case.

Icons are art objects, usually paintings, with a religious theme. The museum's collection has works covering six centuries. You can see a few here: http://www.museumofrussianicons.org/sacred_castings_exhibition.html

Afterward, the group can visit a restaurant or bar for drinks and tapas, but I personally have plans to visit my daughter in New Jersey and will leave for there from the museum.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Bruce holding a Meetup sign
item.name: Visit the Museum of Russian Icons
